statements: SELECT * FROM assistive_technology_usage;
SELECT student_id, usage_date, start_time FROM assistive_technology_usage;
SELECT tool_id, usage_date, end_time FROM assistive_technology_usage;
SELECT * FROM assistive_technology_usage WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT tool_id, usage_date, start_time, end_time FROM assistive_technology_usage WHERE usage_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assistive_technology_usage WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT tool_id, usage_date FROM assistive_technology_usage WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, start_time, end_time FROM assistjsona_technology_usage WHERE tool_id IN (3, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM assistive_technology_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT student_id, tool_id, usage_date, CONCAT(usage_date, ' ', start_time) AS start_datetime FROM assistive_technology_usage WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage WHERE student_id = 123
SELECT tool_name, usage_date FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT tool_name FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage
SELECT student_id, COUNT(tool_name) AS tool_count FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage GROUP BY student_id
SELECT * FROM StudentDisabilityInfo ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, tool_name, usage_duration FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT student_id, tool_name, usage_duration FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage JOIN StudentDisabilityInfo ON AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage.student_id = StudentDisabilityInfo.student_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(tool_name) AS tool_count FROM AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentDisabilityInfo WHERE disability_type LIKE '%physical%' AND enrollment_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, disability_type FROM students WHERE disability_type = 'Visual Impairment';

SELECT student_name, tool_name, tool_category FROM students JOIN tool_usage ON students.student_id = tool_usage.student_id JOIN assistive_technology_tools ON tool_usage.tool_id = assistive_technology_tools.tool_id;
SELECT * FROM assistive_technology_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Communication';

SELECT student_name, tool_name, usage_date FROM students JOIN tool_usage ON students.student_id = tool_usage.student_id JOIN assistive_technology_tools ON tool_usage.tool_id = assistive_technology_tools.tool_id WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, disability_type FROM students WHERE disability_type='Visual Impairment';
SELECT tool_name, tool_category, tool_description FROM assistive_technology_tools WHERE tool_category='Communication Devices';

SELECT student_name, tool_name, usage_date FROM students INNER JOIN tool_usage ON students.student_id = tool_usage.student_id INNER JOIN assistive_technology_tools ON tool_usage.tool_id = assistive_technology_tools.tool_id ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(tool_id) AS tool_count FROM students INNER JOIN tool_usage ON students.student_id = tool_usage.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING tool_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM ToolUsageRecords ORDER BY usage_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_name, disability_type FROM Students WHERE disability_type='Visual Impairment';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM AssistiveTools WHERE tool_name='Screen Reader';
SELECT usage_duration, usage_frequency FROM UsageStatistics WHERE usage_frequency > 5;
SELECT student_name, tool_name, usage_date FROM ToolUsageRecords INNER JOIN Students ON ToolUsageRecords.student_id = Students.id ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ToolUsageRecords ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT tool_name, usage_frequency FROM UsageStatistics WHERE usage_frequency > 10 ORDER BY usage_frequency DESC;

SELECT Students.student_name, AssistiveTools.tool_description FROM Students JOIN ToolUsageRecords ON Students.id = ToolUsageRecords.student_id JOIN AssistiveTools ON ToolUsageRecords.tool_name = AssistiveTools.tool_name;
SELECT tool_name, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM ToolUsageRecords GROUP BY tool_name ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT tool_name, SUM(usage_duration) AS total_duration FROM UsageStatistics GROUP BY tool_name ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssistiveToolsUsage;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students;
SELECT tool_name, quantity, location FROM AssistiveToolInventory WHERE location='Classroom';
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM AssistiveToolCategories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, tool_name, usage_date, duration_minutes FROM Students JOIN AssistiveToolsUsage ON Students.student_id = AssistiveToolsUsage.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE disability_type = 'Visual Impairment';
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT tool_name, location FROM AssistiveToolInventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT student_name, tool_name FROM Students s JOIN StudentAssistiveTools sat ON s.student_id = sat.student_id;
SELECT tool_name, usage_date, duration_minutes FROM AssistiveToolsUsage ORDER BY usage_date ASC, duration_minutes DESC;
